When I use a custom tag lib the Eclipse start ti show this message:

Updating JSP Index
An internal error occured during: "Updating JSP Index".

Just the button OK is avaliable.  The button details steal disable.

No Stacktrace is showed on the screen.

In the error log I got:
java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: javax/servlet/jsp/tagext/TagLibraryInfo

I think the erro 85088 is related.
